oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Summary of the discussion on the 1st Draft of the Research Vision of TIPI, the Technology Innovation Platform of IFOAM
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Niggli, Urs
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Technology transfer
Research communication and quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Summary of the discussion of the TIPI workshop held at the IFOAM Organic World Congress in Istanbul in October 2014. The discussion of the first draft of the TIPI Research Vision (http://orgprints.org/27636/) was attended by 120 scientists, farmers and farm advisors.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Niggli, Urs (2015) Summary of the discussion on the 1st Draft of the Research Vision of TIPI, the Technology Innovation Platform of IFOAM. Working paper, Technology Innovation Platform of IFOAM TIPI.
